item.title: HTML/CSS 101
item.description: HTML DOM (Document Object Model) <html> <head> ... <!-- CDN, CSS files --> </head> <body> ... <!-- Content, JS scripts --> </body> </html> Common tags markdown html # <h1>...</h1> ## <h2>...</h2> **...** <b>...</b> _..._, _..._ <i>...</i> -, * (unordered list) <ul><li>...</li></ul> 1 (ordered list) <ol><li>...</li></ol> [name](url) <a href="url"> name </a> ![alt](img url) <img href="img url"> Selectors id: unique id class: classifier <img id="blah1" class="c1" /> <img id="blah2" class="c2" /> <img
